proposal: #117 - Returning Supercolony lost funds back to the Treasury
rationale: This referendum will transfer 6,011 DOT from the lost Supercolony account to the Polkadot treasury.
details: An unfortunate coincidence led to the loss of the account keys and then a new spending proposal was approved for the same action. We support the idea of sending these funds to the Polkadot treasury.

proposal: #115 - Three New HRMP Channels batch On Polkadot
rationale: This referendum aims to accept and open return channels between Statemint and parachains BitGreen, SubSocial and Manta Network.
details: We support this referendum, because opening HRMP channels with Statemint allows those parachains the access to various native Polkadot assets.

proposal: #179 - Sublab proposal #KSM-2: Substrate client improvements and Kotlinization
rationale: Sublab is requesting 2 637 KSM for the current milestone which includes improvements to existing Substrate clients.
details: We try to help Sublab with this referendum, because they focus is on developing tools for developers in Substrate ecosystem.

proposal: #Re-Propose Ref93 / Opening HRMP Channel WIth HydraDX
rationale: Opening an HRMP channel with HydraDX and Registering xcHDX asset.
details: We love the interoperability idea of parachains, so opening a bi-directional channel will allows HDX to be used on Moonbeam and GLMR on HydraDX.

rationale: Deploying 4.8M DAI of HydraDX POL into Omnipool - 1M DAI into HDX, 3,33M DAI into DOT and 500k DAI into iBTC.
details: Bringing extra liquidity from the POL (protocol owned liquidity) is crucial for success of HydraDX Omnipool - more TVL = more efficient trading.

proposal: #32 - CP45 (RU): Runtime Upgrade 1018 + Add CFG and DOT to Asset Registry
rationale: This referendum will initiate Runtime Upgrade 1018 on Centrifuge and add CFG and DOT to the Asset Registry.
details: By voting AYE, we indicated the approval of expanding investment options for users on Tinlake.
